snippet: Tammam Salam was officially named the new prime minister of Lebanon on Saturday after receiving a string of endorsements from the country’s warring factions over the past few days.
abstract: Tammam Salam, scion of prominent Sunni political family, is officially named new prime minister of Lebanon after receiving string of endorsements from country's warring factions.
lead_paragraph: Tammam Salam was officially named the new prime minister of Lebanon on Saturday after receiving a string of endorsements from the country’s warring factions over the past few days.

headline.seo: Tamam Salam Asked to Form a Government in Lebanon
headline.main: Sunni Leader Is Named Prime Minister in Lebanon
headline.print_headline: Sunni Leader Is Named Prime Minister in Lebanon
